search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Kartra (kartra.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Kartra can be found at: [https://www.kartra.com/plans](https://www.kartra.com/plans)【3:0†source】.

You can make sales even when you're sleeping or when you're out for dinner with your BFFs.
Louise Henry
Tech Expert & Online Business Strategist
Once I saw what Kartra could do, I realized that this is going to be something that can take me very far with my business.
Ryan Turner
Business Consultant
[Kartra helped me] to spread the word and reach as many tennis players and coaches as I possibly can through my online tennis courses and programs.
Cosmin Miholca
Tennis Coach
You can make sales even when you're sleeping or when you're out for dinner with your BFFs.
Louise Henry
Tech Expert & Online Business Strategist
Once I saw what Kartra could do, I realized that this is going to be something that can take me very far with my business.
Ryan Turner
Business Consultant
One platform to market and grow your online business.
Kartra Pages

Utilize our drag-and-drop page builder with hundreds of ready-to-launch designed templates. 100% mobile optimized.


Kartra Leads

Build your leads, prospects, and customer database. Organize them in theme groups via lists and custom tags.

Kartra Funnels & Campaigns

Quickly launch a multi-page funnel flow to convert visitors into leads, leads into customers, and customers into recurrent clients!

Kartra Webinars

Boost your sales while interacting with your audience. Automate your webinar funnel and generate more leads.


Kartra Videos

Video marketers rejoice! Pop offers mid-way through your video, inject lead capture forms and much more.

Kartra Mail

Create live or automated email/SMS marketing campaigns to communicate and engage with your user base.

Kartra Checkouts

Sell products or services online through our secure and gorgeous checkout forms for both credit card and PayPal payments.


Kartra Memberships

Deliver your content, course, or training material with our professionally designed, drag-and-drop membership portal builder.

And so much more…

Surveys & Quizzes, Calendars & Appointments, Funnel Mapper, Affiliates, Agency, Marketplace, and Helpdesk


Got questions?
We've got answers!

What platforms and services does Kartra replace?
How secure is Kartra?
Can I cancel or change plans anytime?
Do I need coding skills?
What languages are available in Kartra?
What currencies are available in Kartra?
Is there a support team that can help assist me if I have more questions?
Is Kartra HIPAA compliant
Does Kartra have any extra fees?
Can I pay for my subscription in my own currency?
Can I pay with PayPal?
What happens if I reach the limits of my plan?
 I need more domains for my account. Is there an add-on I can buy?
